text: Rudniki is a village in Olesno County, Opole Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It is the seat of the gmina (administrative district) called Gmina Rudniki. It lies approximately north-east of Olesno and north-east of the regional capital Opole. In 2004 the village had a population of 897. ==References== Rudniki
title: Rudniki, Opole Voivodeship
